skill.name: linear-milestones-read
skill.description: List Linear project milestones via CLI (read-only operations)
skill.summary: List Linear project milestones via CLI (read-only operations)
skill.author: Bind

security_audit.summary: Legitimate read-only Linear API integration. Accesses LINEAR_API_KEY for authentication and makes authenticated requests to Linear's official API endpoints. No code execution paths, no suspicious network destinations, no filesystem access beyond standard .env configuration. All 40 static findings are false positives triggered by documentation patterns and legitimate credential handling.

content.value_statement: Track project deadlines and milestones across Linear workspaces. Fetch milestone data directly from Linear API with flexible filtering by project name or list all milestones organization-wide.
actual_capabilities: List milestones for a specific Linear project by name
List all milestones across all projects in the workspace
Output milestone data as JSON for scripting
Filter projects using partial case-insensitive matching
Read Linear API key from environment or .env file
limitations: Requires LINEAR_API_KEY to be set in environment
Only reads data; cannot create, update, or delete milestones
Does not support filtering by date range or milestone status
No built-in caching; each call queries the Linear API

use_cases.title: Weekly milestone reviews
use_cases.description: Quickly list upcoming milestones across all projects to prepare for sprint planning meetings

use_cases.title: Deadline awareness
use_cases.description: Check upcoming milestone dates for assigned projects without opening the Linear web interface

use_cases.title: Portfolio progress tracking
use_cases.description: Export milestone data as JSON to build custom dashboards tracking delivery timelines

prompt_templates.title: List project milestones
prompt_templates.scenario: Check milestones for a specific project
prompt_templates.prompt: List the milestones for the {project_name} project in Linear

prompt_templates.title: Show all milestones
prompt_templates.prompt: Show me all milestones across all Linear projects

prompt_templates.title: Export milestones as JSON
prompt_templates.prompt: List all Linear milestones in JSON format so I can process them with jq

prompt_templates.title: Limit results
prompt_templates.prompt: Show the last 10 milestones from Linear in JSON format

output_examples.input: List milestones for the Mount Vernon project
Show all milestones across all projects

best_practices: Store LINEAR_API_KEY securely in environment variables, never hardcode credentials in prompts
Use the --json flag when you need to process milestone data programmatically
Combine with jq for powerful filtering: bun list-milestones.js --all --json | jq '.[] | select(.state == "planned")'
anti_patterns: Do not use this skill to create or modify milestones; it is read-only
Avoid requesting milestone data without specifying --project or --all to prevent errors
Do not share your LINEAR_API_KEY in prompts or with other users

faq.question: Which AI tools support this skill?
faq.answer: Works with Claude, Codex, and Claude Code. Requires bun runtime installed on your system.

faq.question: What are the rate limits for Linear API?
faq.answer: Linear has standard API rate limits. The skill defaults to 25 results to stay within limits.

faq.question: Can I integrate this with other tools?
faq.answer: Yes, use --json output and pipe to jq or other CLI tools for processing and integration.

faq.question: Is my Linear data safe with this skill?
faq.answer: Yes. This is a read-only skill. It only fetches data using your API key and displays it.

faq.question: Why is my API key not working?
faq.answer: Ensure LINEAR_API_KEY is set in your environment or .env file at git root. Get it from Linear Settings > API.

faq.question: How is this different from the Linear web app?
faq.answer: This skill provides CLI access for automation and quick lookups without opening a browser.
